About.meta_description: Learn about Neurora team and our mission
About.about_paragraph: Welcome to Neurora! We are a passionate team dedicated to building the most advanced AI-powered creation platform for creators.

Portfolio.presentation: Welcome to my portfolio page! Here you will find a carefully curated collection of my work and accomplishments. Through this portfolio, I'm to showcase my expertise, creativity, and the value I can bring to your projects.

PortfolioSlug.content: Created a set of promotional materials and branding elements for a corporate event. Crafted a visually unified theme, encompassing a logo, posters, banners, and digital assets. Integrated the client's brand identity while infusing it with a contemporary and innovative approach.

SignIn.meta_description: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.

SignUp.meta_description: Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.

Footer.newsletter_description: Get the latest product updates and insights.

HomePage.hero_description: An AI-powered intelligent creation platform designed specifically for knowledge bloggers and content creators to maximize the value of thinkers.
HomePage.features_description: Integrated with advanced AI technology, providing a complete creation toolkit to help content creators maximize their value.
HomePage.cta_description: Join thousands of creators using Neurora to craft professional content and unlock your creative potential.

nextjs.title: AI-Powered Creation Engine
nextjs.description: Advanced artificial intelligence that understands your content needs, generating high-quality drafts, suggestions, and optimizations tailored to your unique voice and style.

design.title: Professional Content Studio
design.description: Complete content creation toolkit with modern editing interface, collaborative features, and professional templates designed for knowledge creators.

security.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
security.description: Built-in security with encrypted data storage, secure collaboration, and privacy-first approach to protect your intellectual property and content.

performance.title: Lightning-Fast Performance
performance.description: Optimized for speed and efficiency with real-time collaboration, instant previews, and seamless publishing across multiple platforms.

i18n.title: Global Publishing Ready
i18n.description: Multi-language support with automated translation capabilities and localization tools to reach global audiences effortlessly.

testing.title: Quality Assurance
testing.description: Built-in content validation, plagiarism detection, SEO optimization, and analytics to ensure your content meets the highest standards.

HomePage.use_cases_description: Whether you're an individual blogger or an enterprise content team, Neurora scales with your creative ambitions.

individual.label: Individual
individual.title: Personal Knowledge Sharing
individual.description: Designed for individual knowledge bloggers with content creation tools, SEO optimization, and audience engagement features to build your personal brand.

team.label: Team
team.title: Collaborative Content Creation
team.description: Multi-user collaboration with version control and content review workflows, perfect for content teams working together efficiently.

enterprise.label: Enterprise
enterprise.title: Enterprise Content Marketing
enterprise.description: Enterprise-grade security and management features with brand consistency controls, multi-channel publishing, and advanced analytics.

education.label: Education
education.title: Educational Content
education.description: Specially designed for educators with course content creation, learning path design, and student interaction capabilities.

DemoBanner.demo_text: Next.js Template Demo - Developed by Neurora Team

TermsOfService.meta_description: Terms of Service for Neurora AI creation platform
TermsOfService.title: Terms of Service

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Neurora, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.content: Neurora is an AI-powered intelligent creation platform designed specifically for knowledge bloggers and content creators. Our service provides tools for content creation, collaboration, and publishing.

user_accounts.title: 3. User Accounts and Registration
user_accounts.content: You must register for an account to access certain features. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password and for restricting access to your computer.

user_content.title: 4. User Content and Conduct
user_content.content: You retain ownership of content you create using our platform. You grant us a license to use, modify, publicly perform, publicly display, reproduce, and distribute such content on and through the service.

intellectual_property.title: 5. Intellectual Property Rights
intellectual_property.content: The service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of Neurora and its licensors.

ai_usage.title: 6. AI and Data Usage
ai_usage.content: Our AI services may use your content to improve our models and services. We implement appropriate safeguards to protect your intellectual property and privacy.

termination.title: 7. Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.

disclaimers.title: 8. Disclaimers and Limitations
disclaimers.content: The information on this service is provided on an 'as is' basis. To the fullest extent permitted by law, we exclude all representations, warranties, and conditions relating to our service.

governing_law.title: 9. Governing Law
governing_law.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which Neurora operates.

contact.title: 10. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at mark@cs-magic.com

PrivacyPolicy.meta_description: Privacy Policy for Neurora AI creation platform
PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Neurora respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and share information about you when you use our services.

information_collected.title: 2. Information We Collect
information_collected.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, information we obtain automatically when you use our services, and information from third-party sources.

how_we_use.title: 3. How We Use Information
how_we_use.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, send communications, and protect against fraud and abuse.

information_sharing.title: 4. Information Sharing and Disclosure
information_sharing.content: We may share your information in certain limited circumstances, including with your consent, to comply with laws, or to protect rights and safety.

data_retention.title: 5. Data Retention
data_retention.content: We retain personal information for as long as necessary to provide our services, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements.

security.title: 6. Security Measures
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

ai_processing.title: 7. AI and Machine Learning
ai_processing.content: Our AI services process your content to provide intelligent creation assistance. We implement privacy-preserving techniques to protect your data during AI processing.

third_party.title: 8. Third-Party Services
third_party.content: Our service integrates with third-party services for authentication, data storage, and analytics. These services have their own privacy policies.

your_rights.title: 9. Your Rights and Choices
your_rights.content: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, including the right to access, update, delete, or restrict processing.

international_transfers.title: 10. International Data Transfers
international_transfers.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for such transfers.

changes.title: 11. Changes to Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on our website.

contact.title: 12. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at mark@cs-magic.com

CookiePolicy.meta_description: Cookie Policy for Neurora AI creation platform
CookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy

what_are_cookies.title: 1. What Are Cookies
what_are_cookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your computer or mobile device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience by remembering your preferences.

types_of_cookies.title: 2. Types of Cookies We Use
types_of_cookies.content: We use essential cookies for basic functionality, performance cookies to analyze usage, and preference cookies to remember your settings.

third_party_cookies.title: 3. Third-Party Cookies
third_party_cookies.content: We use third-party services for analytics, authentication, and other features. These services may set their own cookies on your device.

cookie_consent.title: 4. Cookie Consent Management
cookie_consent.content: You can manage your cookie preferences through our cookie consent banner and settings. You may accept or reject non-essential cookies.

control_cookies.title: 5. How to Control Cookies
control_cookies.content: You can control and delete cookies through your browser settings. Please note that disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our service.

updates.title: 6. Updates to Cookie Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date.

contact.title: 7. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at mark@cs-magic.com

Pricing.meta_description: Flexible pricing plans for content creators and teams. Start free with 3 projects, upgrade for unlimited AI-powered content creation and collaboration.
Pricing.hero_description: Choose the perfect plan for your content creation needs. Start free and scale as you grow.

free.name: Free
free.description: Perfect for getting started with AI-powered content creation

essentials.name: Essentials
essentials.description: Everything you need for professional content creation

team.name: Team
team.description: Enhanced collaboration and management features for teams

Pricing.enterprise_note: Need more than 50 users? Contact us for enterprise pricing.
Pricing.features_description: Publish and manage your content across all major platforms

testimonial.quote: Neurora has transformed how we create content. The AI assistance is incredibly intuitive and helps us maintain consistency across all our channels.
testimonial.author: Sarah Chen

faq.question: What platforms does Neurora support?
faq.answer: Neurora supports content creation for all major platforms including WordPress, Medium, LinkedIn, Twitter/X, Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, and TikTok. We're constantly adding support for new platforms.

faq.question: Can I change my plan at any time?
faq.answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate your billing accordingly.

faq.question: Is there a free trial?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial for both Essentials and Team plans. No credit card required to start your trial.

faq.question: Do you offer discounts for nonprofits or education?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer special pricing for qualified nonprofit organizations and educational institutions. Contact us at mark@cs-magic.com for more information.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express) and PayPal. For enterprise plans, we also accept bank transfers and purchase orders.

faq.question: Is my data secure?
faq.answer: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade security measures including encryption at rest and in transit, regular security audits, and comply with GDPR and other privacy regulations.
